title: How to Make Flexible LED Panels (DIY Flex Lights!)
description: In this video we'll be making some flexible LED panels that are not only extremely practical, but also perform well when it comes to colour rendition and brightness. They only cost about 40 ($60) to make as well!  Parts links:   Disclosure: These are affiliate links.
